name: Smol.io
description: I believe that software should be free and open-source. And I'm not talking about 'freemium' plans. I'm talking about 100% open-source software. But the problem is, most people aren't motivated enough to make good open-source software. And when somebody creates a good open-source application, like Minecraft, for example, they just end up selling it someone else (Microsoft) who makes it closed-source. This extension, does everything BitLY can, but there's one small difference. There's no paid plan, no signup required. So what're you waiting for? Install it!
